scripts.setup: git config core.hooksPath .husky && npm install && uv sync && open -a Docker && sleep 5 && docker compose up -d postgres && sleep 2 && DB_PORT=$(docker compose port postgres 5432 | cut -d: -f2) && APP_PORT=$((50000 + RANDOM % 10000)) && echo "DATABASE_URL=postgresql://adcp:localdev@localhost:$DB_PORT/adcp_registry" >> .env.local && echo "DATABASE_SSL=false" >> .env.local && echo "CONDUCTOR_PORT=$APP_PORT" >> .env.local && npm run db:migrate
